headline: Elie Mystal: Crazy Trumpers Have Completely Taken Over GOP
author: Pam Key
sentences: Discussing Georgia Republican U.S. Senate candidate Herschel Walker, fill-in host Katie Fang said, He will eventually have to address the critical issues, the core issues, the kitchen table issues that are confronting not only all of us and the United States by the people in Georgia.
The Nations justice correspondent Elie Mystal on Friday on MSNBCs All In, declared Trumpers had taken over the Republican Party, adding the crazy people were now in charge.
But they are not doing the work in their own party of stopping being these people at the primary stage because the Trumpers have completely taken over that party.
So, you can go on this network, and you can find a bunch of former Republicans who now want the Democratic Party to start acting like the Republican Party.
Mystal said, It is going to work for Republicans until voters start punishing them for putting forward these clown candidates.
She added, You and I both know that he will not stand a chance against the brilliance of someone like Raphael Warnock.
He continued, The inmates are running the asylum, and its the crazy people now in charge of that party.
And Walker, he will not even show up for that debate we talked about.
Thats what we have not seen so far from the Republican base.
So, is this just a throwaway for the GOP at this point?
